infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to camera to take photos of properties and save them to your device.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app needs access to microphone to record voice notes during property tours and viewings.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to photos to access property photos and documents saved in your phone's gallery.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs access to location to find nearby properties and get directions to viewings.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: This app needs access to contacts to contact agents, property managers, and save important contacts.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This app needs access to calendar to schedule property viewings and set reminders for open houses.
infoPlist.NSUserNotificationsUsageDescription: This app needs notification access to alert you about new listings, price changes, and availability updates.

plugins.contactsPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your contacts to contact agents, property managers, and save important contacts.

plugins.calendarPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your calendar to schedule property viewings and set reminders for open houses.
